reviews.review: 버그 갓겜, 매칭 갓겜, 여러모로 문제는 많지만 그래도 꿀잼.
Классная игра

Fun to play with friends or solo, though I don't recommend it if you are easily getting tilted when killed. Sometimes contributing few gens/heals/unhooks and then dying is enough to maintain your rank or even progress a little. 
Some killers are hard to play against and there's no helping that, just try your best.
Similarly sometimes it's not possible to kill all 4 survivors if they are a premade team with good perks and items.

The one thing that irritates me is that unlocking perks and characters is an endless grind. You need a whole lot of Bloodpoints or Iridescent shards to get characters and perks that you want. It feels like this was designed this way to force you into buying premium currency for cash. 

Also not all survivors/killers are availble for free in-game currency, so make sure that you don't base your purchase on characters you've seen gameplay of and then end up being unable to play them without paying for dlcs.

130 hours in, and I have a love-Hate relationship with this game.

It frequently makes me want to smash up my skull yet I keep coming back to it because it is just so rewarding and overall enjoyable.
Just beware of the extremely toxic community, especially when playing as the killer. You can do everything perfect and still get called every word in existence because of the sheer amount of salt people receive when they don't win. And prepare to be mocked hard for every small tiny mistake you make, no matter who you play, especially as a new player.

It takes a very long time to really learn and understand this game and I found it comes more down to experience than knowledge. Especially when mind gaming, which you need to do to survive or kill effectively.

I have played this game for a while now and as much fun as it was playing i can't really get any sort of enjoyment from it except if i play with friends and even then it is painful to play. Killers will either slug you until you bleed out, or just run Michael Myers and insta kill you without downing you because the devs cannot balance add-ons. If You can somehow get passed this problem the game itself can be okay if you are a survivor but don't expect to use a perk pool larger than 10 and even those perks will get kicked to the curb because killers are always at a disadvantage. I play both sides and i can say that it is killer favored to an extent because the killer has the ability to ruin your day by camping, tunneling, slugging etc. The recent releases have been somewhat underwhelming with the new survivor perks being unusable or niche and ofc they require fixing and multiple patches and the killer perks being actually good or at least usable (i say this loosely). And if u can somehow get passed that there are still a multitude of issues with hit-boxes, lagging, hackers going around unpunished just ruining the game for everybody, not being able to get or hold licences for certain chapters and the devs not really listening to the community. All in all if you can get passed all of the flaws it can be a fun game only in a lobby with at least two people because solo queue is a nightmare.

So yeah, i do not really recommend this game, you can buy it if u want and play it yourself but be prepared to not have that much fun the majority of the time.

Блин, игра очень нравится. Нравится больше пятницы 13. Нравится тем, что она быстрее, динамичней, в чём-то проще. Начал играть ещё на плойке, хоть и не сразу, а как только на неё появилась годная скидка) Могу сказать, что на плойке  мне проще играть из-за джойста (в принципе его можно и на пк купить, но, вечно находится что-то, что важнее джойста га данный момент). На джойстике развороты проще делать. Но, и цены на плойке в 3 раза больше чем на пк, но там просадок нет, хоть комп у меня и не совсем картофельный, да и на плойке уже слишком много чего есть. В общем, мне игра очень зашла.

n1 game

Dead By Daylight is a great game, probably one of my favorites. 
It is about 400 hours since my last review, and would probably summarise it as a 4v1 survivor vs killer game, 
with a bunch of toxicity. 
So why do I still play it? 
Well, because amongs the many... many toxic players (killers and surviviors) there are those, very nice people and great matches where you both have fun. It is a great game, and I 100% recommend it, even though it is not for everyone, I would say give it a try. 
And what if you don't like it?
Well as long as you have had less than 2 hours and had the game for less than 2 weeks, just ask for a steam refund. 
You won't lose anything on it :D

I've played this game on both Xbox One and on PC. With over +900 hours combined, I can say without a doubt I'm hooked. With a plenty of killers and plenty of survivors to chose from, it's easy to find someone to fit your style.

Killers range from stealthy killers to more powerhouses. Ones that won't give you a heads up they are headed your way, to the revving of chainsaws from afar. With perks that will help give you an advantage and builds that can help you with certain aspects during the matches.

With survivors, the perks will also help you escape the trail. From giving you abilities to enhance you escape from chase, become stealthier and work on objectives.

The game is fairly simplistic. Survivors work on generators that will open the exit gates, and killers must down and hook survivors. There is a tutorial that had been introduced to help give basics of game play.

While not everything is unlocked, as some things are unlocked through purchases like licensed survivors, killers and chapters, the perks can be unlocked through a weekly changing shrine. It's quite often that things also go on sale, especially during Halloween, as surprising as it is. 

Overall, I highly recommend this game.

一直没有什么时间玩杀鸡但这个游戏真的带给我很多。如果不是因为它，我会错过很多宝藏主播，也会错过steam上的一切（因为杀鸡是我开始玩steam的动力），不会发现游戏的美好；也不会进入恐影的坑（电锯惊魂、万圣节、猛鬼街等等）。
不管怎样，杀鸡已经成为我人生中的一个重要标点了，今后的日子，我会永远记得这段在雾中的时光。(然而这跟我菜又有什么关系呢)（卑微落泪）
